_id.title: Assessment Name
_id.description: Unique name for the assessment. This is required by other plugins such as the 'Assessment Results' component to identify the assessment and display its variables.

_attempts.title: Attempts Allowed
_attempts.description: Controls the number of attempts the user is allowed to have on this assessment. Set to -1 (or 0) to allow infinite attempts.

_isPercentageBased.title: Percentage based
_isPercentageBased.description: Determines whether the value of 'Pass mark' should be treated as a percentage (default) or as the raw score.

_scoreToPass.title: Pass mark
_scoreToPass.description: The minimum score required by the learner to pass the assessment.

_includeInTotalScore.title: Include in Total Score
_includeInTotalScore.description: Determines if the score from this assessment should be sent to the LMS. The score sent is a percentage according to 'Assessment Weight'.

_assessmentWeight.title: Assessment Weight
_assessmentWeight.description: If there are multiple assessments in the course, this value controls the proportion of the LMS score which is attributed to this assessment, i.e. 1 equals 100%, 0.5 is 50%, etc.

_suppressMarking.title: Suppress Marking
_suppressMarking.description: Determines whether question marking should be delayed until completion of the assessment or until all attempts have been exhausted.

_isResetOnRevisit.title: Reset on Revisit
_isResetOnRevisit.description: Controls whether the assessment should be reset automatically (up to the number of available attempts) when a user revisits the page.

_allowResetIfPassed.title: Allow retry once passed?
_allowResetIfPassed.description: Controls whether the assessment may be reset after it has been passed (whilst there are attempts remaining).

_isEnabled.title: Enabled
_isEnabled.description: If randomisation is enabled, a specified number of blocks will be displayed to the user in a random order.

_blockCount.title: Block Count
_blockCount.description: The number of blocks to present to the learner. Set to -1 (or 0) to display all blocks.

_isEnabled.title: Enabled
_isEnabled.description: Enables associating blocks of question components with a 'bank', allowing questions to be grouped then rendered via the 'Split' property.

_split.title: Split
_split.description: This is a comma-separated list of numbers corresponding to the number of questions to be drawn from each question bank. The position of the number in the list corresponds to the 'Bank ID' assigned, e.g. "3,2" would display three questions from Bank 1 and two from Bank 2.

_randomisation.title: Randomise Question Banks
_randomisation.description: Controls whether the questions will be displayed in a random order.

_resetType.title: Reset Type
_resetType.description: Determines whether the question will register as completed when reset. When assigned a value of 'soft', the learner may continue to interact with it, but the complete attribute remains set to true. When assigned 'hard', complete is set to false, and the learner will be forced to complete it again if it is reset.

_canShowFeedback.title: Show Feedback
_canShowFeedback.description: Allows the user to view feedback on their answer.

_canShowMarking.title: Show Marking
_canShowMarking.description: Displays ticks and crosses on question completion.

_canShowModelAnswer.title: Show Model Answer
_canShowModelAnswer.description: Allows the user to view the 'model answer' should they answer the question incorrectly.
